name: Freely
text1: for each chat contact you want to unlock (unlimited messages)
text2: - The announcement can be maintained on the platform forever.
extra: Low relevance means that your announcement has a lightly lower possibility to appear on customer outlet store

name: Weekly
extra: * High relevance means that your announcement has high possibility to appear on customer outlet store

name: Monthly
extra: Top relevance means that your announcement will be shown as a priority in the outlet
